atlantis_talk_05_rival_01a:
So Koraidon’s an ancient Pokémon...
No wonder no one’s seen it before![npcn:4]
atlantis_talk_05_rival_01b:
So Miraidon’s a future Pokémon...
No wonder no one’s seen it before![npcn:4]
atlantis_talk_05_rival_02:
[trnm:0]! You’ve gotta let me battle
[pknm:1] right now![npcn:4]
atlantis_talk_05_botan_01: Um. It still won’t come out of its Poké Ball.[npcn:8]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_01a:
That was the first I heard of it coming from the
past myself...[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_01b:
That was the first I heard of it coming from the
future myself...[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_02a:
It was just some weird Pokémon my mom brought
home all of a sudden one day.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_02b:
It was just some weird Pokémon my dad brought
home all of a sudden one day.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_03:
We all lived together at the lighthouse lab for
a little while.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_04:
My [mom;dad:gs] made me promise to keep it a secret.
And I had to take care of it for h[er;im:gs], too...[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_rival_04: So that’s why you knew so much about it![npcn:4]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_05:
Yeah, but then one day [pknm:1] just
went nuts against some wild Pokémon...[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_06:
A few of the folks living nearby ended up
seeing it, so the secret was out.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_07a:
Once that happened, my mom took it—and went
back to Area Zero.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_07b:
Once that happened, my dad took it—and went
back to Area Zero.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_botan_05:
Guess that makes sense if it’s a Pokémon from a
different age...[npcn:8]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_08:
Yeah. If people found out, it’d be all over
the news.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_09a:
I didn’t see my mom or Koraidon again after that.
For ages.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_09b:
I didn’t see my dad or Miraidon again after that.
For ages.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_09: Looking back on it now, it seems stupid, but...[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_10:
I felt like I’d lost my [mom;dad:gs] ’cause of [Ko;Mi:gs]raidon.
It was the worst feeling ever.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_11:
I just hated [pknm:1] and everything about it.
Didn’t want to even talk about it.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_friend_12:
I’m sorry for not telling you what I knew
sooner, [trnm:0]...[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_05_rival_10:
You should be sorry! Shoot—that’s, like, the
coolest thing ever, and you didn’t tell any of us![npcn:4]
atlantis_talk_05_botan_06:
Yup. Sure would’ve been great to know all that
relevant info before we got here.[npcn:8]
